s = input()
K = int(input())

substrings = set()

for i in range(len(s)):
    for j in range(i, len(s)):
        substrings.add(s[i:j+1])

print(sorted(substrings)[K-1])

import sys

# read the input
s = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()
K = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())

# create a list of all substrings
substrings = [s[i:j] for i in range(len(s)) for j in range(i+1, len(s)+1)]

# sort the list of substrings
substrings.sort()

# print the Kth substring
print(substrings[K-1])

import sys

s = input()
K = int(input())

# 各文字列の長さを格納する配列
length = []
# 各文字列を格納する配列
strings = []
# 各文字列をソートして格納する配列
sorted_strings = []

for i in range(len(s)):
    for j in range(i, len(s)):
        length.append(j - i + 1)
        strings.append(s[i:j+1])

sorted_strings = sorted(strings)

print(sorted_strings[K-1])

def main():
    s = input()
    k = int(input())

    sub_str = sorted(set(s[i:j] for i in range(len(s)) for j in range(i+1, len(s)+1)))
    print(sub_str[k-1])


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
